thread.title: Great for a quick trip with the kids
thread.title_full: Great for a quick trip with the kids - Review of New York Marriott East Side, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: DROJC
title: Great for a quick trip with the kids
text:
I travel to NY frequently for work. This time was for pleasure with the wife and kids and needed more room than usual (NY hotel rooms are smaller than average).
The Marriott East Side was great. Ideal location for a December family trip (near Rockafeller Center for the Rockettes, tree, skating). The room was clean, the service was very good and the concierge was helpful. Great views too!
Only one minor issue - our toilet backed up twice, but staff responded quickly, so no big deal!
I would stay again with the family!
